history.proof: intros k l Hin. induction l as [|h t IH]. - simpl. auto. - simpl. destruct h. + auto. + right. apply IH. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} k, k0 : K t : list op Hin : In k (get_op_output_keys (I k0 :: t)) IH : In k (get_op_output_keys t) -> In (O k) t Unable to unify "In (O k) t" with "I k0 = O k \\/ In (O k) t".

In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} k, k0 : K t : list op Hin : In k (get_op_output_keys (O k0 :: t)) IH : In k (get_op_output_keys t) -> In (O k) t Unable to unify "?M1798 = ?M1799 \\/ (fix In (a : ?M1797) (l : list ?M1797) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) ?M1799 ?M1800" with "(fix In (a : op) (l : list op) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) (O k) t".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (k : K) (l : list op), In k (get_op_output_keys l) -> In (O k) l

Premises:
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
get_op_output_keys = fun l : list op => filterMap (fun x : op => match x with | I _ => None | O k => Some k end) l : list op -> list K Arguments get_op_output_keys _%list_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
get_op_input_keys_sound : forall (k : K) (l : list op), In k (get_op_input_keys l) -> In (I k) l
acknowledged_op_defn : forall (k : K) (xs : list op), acknowledged_op k xs -> In (O k) xs
acknowledged_op_I_cons_reduce : forall (k k' : K) (l : list op), acknowledged_op k (I k' :: l) -> acknowledged_op k l
acknowledged_op_I_cons_expand : forall (k k' : K) (l : list op), acknowledged_op k l -> acknowledged_op k (I k' :: l)
acknowledge_all_ops_func_target_nil : forall l : list op, (forall k : K, ~ In (O k) l) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l [] = []
op_equivalent_all_Is_O : forall (l : list op) (k : K), (forall k' : K, In (I k') l -> k <> k') -> op_equivalent (l ++ [O k]) (O k :: l)
not_in_assoc : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (k : K) (l : list (K * V)), ~ In k (map fst l) -> assoc K_eq_dec l k = None
before_head_op : forall (l : list op) (h : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) l -> before (O k1) (I k2) l -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI h :: ir)) -> forall x : op, In (I h) l -> before x (I h) l -> exists k : K, x = I k
op_equivalent_all_Is_I : forall (l : list op) (k : K), (forall x : op, In x l -> exists k0 : K, x = I k0) -> op_equivalent (l ++ [I k]) (I k :: l)
acknowledge_all_ops_func_target_ext : forall (l : list op) (t t' : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t -> In (IRU k) t') -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t' -> In (IRU k) t) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l t = acknowledge_all_ops_func l t'
acknowledge_all_ops_was_in : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) l
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l
acknowledge_all_ops_func_IRU_In : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR) (k : K), In (IRU k) (acknowledge_all_ops_func l ir) -> In (I k) l
nodup_In : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), In x (nodup decA l) < -> In x l
in_remove_all_preserve : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x ds -> In x l -> In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l)
acknowledged_op = fun (k : K) (trace : list op) => In (O k) trace : K -> list op -> Prop Arguments acknowledged_op _ _%list_scope
in_remove_all_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l) -> In x l
in_remove_all_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l) -> In x ds -> False
before_remove_all_if : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (l xs : list A), before x y l -> ~ In x xs -> before x y (remove_all A_eq_dec xs l)
acknowledged_op_dec : forall (k : K) (tr : list op), {acknowledged_op k tr} + {~ acknowledged_op k tr}
not_good_op_move_IO : forall k : K, good_op_move (I k) (O k) -> False
remove_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x (remove eq_dec x l)
AAO_O : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)
get_op_input_keys_complete : forall (xs : list op) (k : K), In (I k) xs -> In k (get_op_input_keys xs)
good_op_move_neq_IO : forall k k' : K, k <> k' -> good_op_move (I k) (O k')
count_occ_not_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x l < -> count_occ eq_dec l x = 0
collate_not_in_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (h' h : A) (f : A -> A -> list B) (l : list (A * B)), ~ In h (map fst l) -> collate A_eq_dec h' f l h' h = f h' h
get_op_input_keys_defn : forall (x : op) (l : list op), get_op_input_keys (x :: l) = match x with | I k => k :: get_op_input_keys l | O _ => get_op_input_keys l end
get_op_output_keys_defn : forall (x : op) (l : list op), get_op_output_keys (x :: l) = match x with | I _ => get_op_output_keys l | O k => k :: get_op_output_keys l end
in_fold_left_by_cons_in : forall A B : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (l : list B) (g : B -> A) (x : A) (acc : list A), In x (fold_left (fun (a : list A) (b : B) => g b :: a) l acc) -> In x acc \/ (exists y : B, In y l /\ x = g y)
count_occ_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l < -> count_occ eq_dec l x > 0
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_ind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
remove_all_cons : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ys : list A) (a : A) (l : list A), remove_all A_eq_dec ys (a :: l) = remove_all A_eq_dec ys l /\ In a ys \/ remove_all A_eq_dec ys (a :: l) = a :: remove_all A_eq_dec ys l /\ ~ In a ys
good_op_move_OO : forall k k' : K, good_op_move (O k) (O k')
not_good_op_move_OI : forall k k' : K, good_op_move (O k) (I k') -> False
pigeon : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l sub1 sub2 : list A, (forall a : A, In a sub1 -> In a l) -> (forall a : A, In a sub2 -> In a l) -> NoDup l -> NoDup sub1 -> NoDup sub2 -> length sub1 + length sub2 > length l -> exists a : A, In a sub1 /\ In a sub2
good_move_U_l : forall (k : K) (x : IR), good_move (IRU k) x
filterMap : (?A -> option ?B) -> list ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
good_op_move_good_move_IO : forall k k' : K, good_op_move (I k) (O k') -> good_move (IRI k) (IRO k')

```intros k l Hin.
unfold get_op_output_keys.
induction l as [|h t IH].
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. destruct h.
  + simpl. apply IH. assumption.
  + simpl. right. apply in_cons. apply IH. assumption.
Qed.```

original: intros k l Hin. unfold get_op_output_keys. induction l as [|h t IH]. - simpl. auto. - simpl. destruct h. + simpl. apply IH. auto. + simpl. right. apply in_cons. apply IH. auto.
